intro: Epidendrum urbanianum, commonly known as the Urbanian Epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Orchidaceae family and is characterized by its striking, often brightly colored flowers. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees in humid, shaded environments. Its leaves are usually broad and革质, providing structural support and efficient water retention. The flowers bloom in clusters, showcasing a variety of hues that attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies.
